pros: Bouncier than most 4D shoes; Comfortable in-shoe feel; Wider-than-average sole; Very flexible; Durable outsole; Innovative cushioning tech; Attention grabber; Sustainable
cons: Upper stretches a lot over time; Lacks breathability; Rather heavy
RR_verdict: The Adidas 4DFWD impressed us from the start with its jaw-dropping midsole. Although molded as running footwear, we believe that it wins the lifestyle category for its all-day cozy steps and striking looks. With its overall performance and admirable eco-friendly make-up, this kick is a real treat for our feet. At the same time, this innovative approach to cushioning can also work for moderate running.
awards: Top 20% in road running shoes, Top 22% in Adidas running shoes
